item.description:
The John Cunningham for Congress campaign would like to thank all of you for your help and dedication. We are are amazed at the quality and quality of the support we're receiving. We are grateful for you help and will continue to ask for it.

Please come join us this 4th of July to help John meet with voters in Natick. We had a wonderful time at several Memorial Day parades where people just loved meeting John. We will do it again for the 4th of July and will meet at:

8:15 am
Stop and Shop Parking Lot
829 Worcester St
Natick, MA
(Parade Starts at 9 am)

We hope to see you there. If you're arriving late, or you can't find us, or you have any problems, please call me.

Matt Robinson
Campaign Manager, John Cunningham For Congress
617-595-8229

www.JohnCunninghamForCongress.com
item.name: Support Ron Paul Congressional Candidate JC Cunningham July 4 Parade in Natick
